meanings.definition: The process of recovering from an illness or medical treatment.
meanings.sent1: After her surgery, she entered convalescence to get better.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended plenty of rest during convalescence.
meanings.sent3: During convalescence, he joked that watching TV was his new full-time job.
meanings.sent4: Her convalescence was like a caterpillar in a cocoon, transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The convalescence felt like a slow but steady climb back to health.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which one is recovering from an illness or medical treatment.
meanings.sent1: The convalescence after the accident was challenging but necessary.
meanings.sent2: She spent her convalescence reading books and enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent3: During convalescence, he counted the days until he could go back to work.
meanings.sent4: The convalescence felt like a pause button on his busy life.
meanings.sent5: Her convalescence was a time of reflection and healing.
